5    | $Header: UTIL.C Thu 11-02-2000 9:25:56 pm HvA V1.00 $
6    | 
7    | Some common utilities
8    | ***************************************************************************/
9    | 
10   | #include <stdio.h>
11   | #include <string.h>
12   | #include <ctype.h>
13   | 
14   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
15   | This function strips the leading and trailing spaces of a string
16   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
17   | char *trimstr(char *s)
18   | {
19   |   int i = 0;
20   |   int len;
21   | 
22   |   /*--- Strip leading blanks  */
23   |   /*--- First find 1st non-blank  */
24   |   while (s[i] == ' ') {
25   |     i++;
26   |   }
27   |   strcpy(s,s+i);
28   | 
29   |   /*--- Strip trailing blanks  */
30   |   len = strlen(s);
31   |   while (isspace(s[len-1])) {
32   |     s[len-1] = '\0';
33   | 	len--;
34   |   }
35   | 
36   |   return(s);
37   | }
38   | 
39   | 	  
40   |     
41   | 
42   |
